title: [Medicine] Diabetic patients taking the natural product goldenseal while taking the prescription drug metformin may be unwittingly sabotaging their efforts to maintain healthy blood glucose levels. This concern arose from a recent study published in the journal Clinical Pharmacology & Therapeutics.

[Health] The invisible killer lurking in our consumer products. Nanomaterials bind strongly to microorganisms, which are a source of food for other organisms, this is how they can enter our food chain. Once inside an organism, they can change and turn into a more dangerous material that can penetrate cells
